name: Dreamy
description:
Collect items of same color or type to raise combo points! For example, after picking up red flower, you can pick other red items or other flowers.

WASD or arrow keys to move.

Made for Trijam in three hours. Idea based on a dream, hence the name. This is my third time attempting the three hour challenge, and the first time I've succeeded!

Art, programming: aXu

Music, sfx: Mubsi

Font: Open Sans
